text:
@realDonaldTrump You're such a snowflake , DonCon. Just admit you fucked up , and move forward. You didn't say jackshit about a PARTIAL travel ban until February 2. You had no other plans to fight the virus then .You were warned about coronavirus December 31.
So yeah , you mishandled it.
